geninfo.para: There are many changes in the HVAC system on International 4300, 4400 model vehicles as compared to previous International vehicles. Before performing any air conditioning repairs on the 4300, 4400 models, read the HVAC Service Manual section, S16025.

Included in the changes is the use of a rotary refrigerant compressor (Sanden) instead of a reciprocating compressor (CCI). The rotary compressor requires PAG oil instead of the Ester oil used in reciprocating compressors. The rotary (Sanden) refrigerant compressor requires International refrigerant oil part number 2644034R1.
The HVAC system uses HFC-134A refrigerant, commonly referred to as R-134A.

The system refrigerant capacity is 30 oz., or 1.875 lbs. Early Operator's Manuals show an incorrect system capacity. The manual has been revised (part number 3559880R2, dated April 2001) to show the correct capacity of 30 oz.
